text: Tekh, kotoryye vozvodyat lozhnyye obvineniya v prelyubodeyanii na veruyushchikh, tselomudrennykh, chistykh, nevinnykh zhenshchin, - obvineniya, o kotorykh nel'zya dazhe podumat', - a eti zhenshchiny tak predalis' Allakhu svoyey dushoy, chto i ne zamechayut togo, chto o nikh govoryat, Allakh lishit Svoyey milosti v blizhayshey zhizni i v dal'ney zhizni. Dlya nikh (etikh lzhetsov) budet ugotovano velikoye nakazaniye, yesli oni ne raskayutsya
